code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var modalSlice=createSlice({name:'modal',initialState:{modalPos:false},reducers:{setModalOpen:function setModalOpen(state){state.modalPos=true;},setModalClose:function setModalClose(state){state.modalPos=false;}}});var _modalSlice$actions=modalSlice.actions,setModalOpen=_modalSlice$actions.setModalOpen,setModalClose=_modalSlice$actions.setModalClose;export{setModalOpen,setModalClose};export var modalState=function modalState(state){return state.modal.modalPos;};export default modalSlice.reducer;
